data.name: 无敌荒野/Unbeatable wilderness
data.detailed_description: Players must try their best to get food, make tools, and repel beasts. Repel all kinds of poisonous insects and aggressive animals. Players can harvest wood by cutting down trees with axes, and can pick up stone making tools. Players can use firearms, guns and axe. Animals can be killed and animals can be eaten for nutrition and petroleum. Oil is a necessary material for torch combustion and making tools. Players can dive into the water to catch the crab. Please pay attention to the consumption of oxygen. Note that there are weather changes in the game, bad weather has an impact on health values, players can ignite torches to warm up...

data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microft Windows Professional edition 2002 Service Pack 3
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mobile Intel(R) 4 Series Express Chipset Family
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio output
  • Additional Notes: The higher the configuration, the smoother the run
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microft Windows Professional edition 2002 Service Pack 3
  • Processor: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mobile Intel(R) 4 Series Express Chipset Family
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio output
  • Additional Notes: The higher the configuration, the smoother the run
